overview: “When the thought and the mind goes away, all you are left with is the real part of yourself…. In the quiet, there is a sense of eternality and unconditional love.” ~ Bob Fergeson Set among the otherworldly heights of the Rocky Mountains, Mountain High tells the story of photographer, mountaineer, and spiritual teacher Bob Fergeson. The intersection of spirituality and creativity is a driving theme of Bob’s spiritual search. His struggles with alcoholism, studies in dreamwork, and experiments with celibacy are all covered in this fascinating spiritual documentary. TAT Foundation Press presents this film in cooperation with Poetry in Motion Films.
title: Mountain High
